attributes.action: Bring in stricter safety regulations for caravans and have testing similar to MOT tests.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many caravans are poorly maintained and pose a safety risk to other motorists on the roads.  Stricter controls and annual testing, similar to the present vehicle MOT, should be applied.  Devon and Cornwall police have an annual campaign around the counties which highlights just how many defective caravans are on the roads.
